import React, { Component } from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import {connect} from "react-redux"; import {getProjectTask} from "../../actions/projectTaskActions"; class UpdateProjectTask extends Component { componentDidMount(){ const {pt_id} = this.props.match.params; this.props.getProjectTask(pt_id); } render() { return (
Back to Board

); } } UpdateProjectTask.propTypes = { project_task: PropTypes.func.isRequired, errors: PropTypes.func.isRequired, getProjectTask: PropTypes.func.isRequired } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ project_task: state.project_task, errors: state.errors }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, {getProjectTask}) (UpdateProjectTask);
